title: This Month Was Tough on Us..

comments.comment: The first sickness is always the worst, it is usually an ear infection with babies about this age. It is always scary as hell. A flu with a baby is terrifying, more than glad that he is alright. Merry Christmas to you all!

Watching this makes me realize how old I really am now. I can't believe pewds, the guy that I used to watch having meme wars with children, dancing in women's underwear, is now doing so great at being a dad to his wonderful son.

He went from a small apartment on the floor where the kitchen was in the living room. A small laptop, mic, camera, and a big dream. Now he's traveling and showing himself and his family all the exciting and beautiful things this world has to offer. So proud of him. To watch him grow and now his son is a huge honor. Bro fist
I've wondered how many languages Björn will learn growing up. Italian mom, Swedish dad, growing up in Japan, speaking English with his parents. That little man will be a multilingual super star
Seeing Momo run made me tear up cause I remember the jabba the hut song... I miss Maya. :(
Jesus Pewds you look more and more like your dad when I watch. Bjorn is growing up fast. Thank you for documenting some parts of your life with us, hope one day Bjorn watches these vlogs.

Seeing Pewds and Marzia being happy is like the post-game after you get the ending.
Now it's just side quests because you beat the game.

Also, Edgar is the MVP.
Personally I'm liking this new version of Pewdiepie, seeing the Pewdiepie Jr. grow up as I get old. Can't wait to see this channel 10-20 years from now.
seeing pewds as a father after all these years is just to wholesome
Pewds' dad arc is exactly the kind of healing content I need in my life rn. Christmas looks lovely for you guys!

Marzia's fashion is just top tier. Every time I see her in the vlogs, I miss her videos.  But I am so glad that she was able to do other things that she found passion for instead of being chained to YouTube!
This is what a guy that won in life looks like
20:20 Pewds just skipped an obvious Yakuza side quest
seeing bjorn sad and sick made me want to cry  so glad you all recovered and hoping for a healthy rest of the winter!

i haven't watched this channel in a few years, because i felt like i had outgrown his content/humor as i transitioned into adulthood. but seeing this, he and his cute little family, this made me smile.
9:34 this is so cute the way he tries to imitate his dad🥹
0 seconds in and Bjorn's already silly. Love that guy.
Bjorn is just so adorable.. And he is slowly looking much more like Marzia, especially his smile.
Bjorn is just adorable, honestly, his eyes are so beautiful blue. i am so happy for you guys.
It's the worst, seeing your little one sick. Especially for a long time,  having children is amazing, but when sickness strikes, it is absolutely heartbreaking. Best wishes for you and your family
Having a rough time with depression strikes, your japan vlog is one of the few things that reminds me there is still beauty in life. I could feel the joy and peace in another perspective.

That bjorn guy is such a weird side character

Hope they make a spinoff

I watched you and Marzia when I was in high school. I remember when you guys got together and I loved Marzia’s content and saw her as a role model. Now, I have a son who’s about 4 months younger than Björn and I can’t state how lovely it’s been seeing your development as parents. It feels like I’ve grown up along side you guys and now get to experience parenthood and relate to that with your content. Congrats on your beautiful family and life - you’re truly the best.

3人とも病気になられて大変でしたね。
異国の地で病気になると大変だと思いますが、自分達で病院を見つけ、診察も受け、その他の生活基盤も築いておられるのは素晴らしいですね。
The way Bjorn instantly stops crying after "you can whisk" is the absolute cutest, he's so squishy
I love how great of a dad you’re being Felix,respect.
Who'd have thought Pewds would be my source of wholesome content just a few years ago.

Having finally visited Japan, it was everything I had hoped for and more. Tokyo especially is astonishing. How could such a huge city possibly be so quiet, clean, safe, and beautiful? It’s a mega city without all the negative aspects that are inherent to cities in every other country.

Going early December was definitely the right choice, nice temperature and weather, and beautiful autumn colors everywhere. I can definitely see why it’s your favorite season, and why you moved there. I wanna do the same one day.

Also a first time dad of a boy whos 19 months. My wife, my son, and I just came out of a 9 day stretch of sickness. it was tough. More tough seeing your baby being sick than actually being sick yourself. Glad you guys are feeling better!

Pewdiepie, seeing so many Japanese fans comment in Japanese makes me so happy as I realised how wonderful it is to see your own country be loved by so many internationally. Maybe you could hire somebody, or one day when you are comfortable enough with your Japanese proficiency, include Japanese subtitles? I think lots of Japanese fans would love to follow along more fluently.
11:02 - omg, Bjorn sneaking glances over the side with his little bunny ears, I can't
seems like such genuinely good parenting, letting him figure it out on his own without direct control and comfort! love these guys

i’ve loved watching Pewds go from “haha feed them dog food” to “good job bjorn!” none of us including pewds expected him to be a father, but he’s evolved into such a wholesome dad. the growth of the family is so pure and wholesome and full of love  so proud of felix and marzia
ピューディパイパパは優しくていいですね。日本の秋には紅葉がきれいな所が沢山あるので楽しんで欲しいです。
I love seeing Felix with Bjorn. He's such a silly dad, I can tell he loves his son a lot. Seeing him make Bjorn laugh made me smile
3:00 my daughter just got the hippo keyboard. It's so cool seeing someone like pewds in the same stage of life. It's making me smile! Congrats on this life you have made Felix. It is beautiful!

いつも素敵なビデオをありがとう
癒されるし家族が欲しくなる
ピューディーパイさんはすごくいい人オーラが滲み出てていいパパですね　次のビデオも楽しみに待ってます

This is the kind of content I want online - just pure wholesomeness and escapism for me. You're living the dream man I aspire to be like you when I've grown up. Tack för allt du gör! Go' jul på dig och hela familjen.
Hoppas det kanske blir kalles på Julafton.

Pewds is the most successful and the most normal youtuber most of the others end up being exposed as pdf files and other weird stuff or they are toxic and don't have kids....respect for pewds he is the definition of "made it in life".
this vlog is like so picture perfect and wholesome. it's beautiful to watch. merry christmas pewds & family
Nahhh Bjorn is just way too cute and it melts my heart everytime. Imagine the Lore he's gonna have when he grows up.
自然と都会をアクティブに行動してたくさんの経験をしたお子様はきっと感性の豊かな大人になりますね素敵なパパです奥様も素敵日本🇯🇵を選んでくれて嬉しいです

いつも幸せな家族の映像をありがとうございます！癒されます。日本で嫌な思いをせず、静かに穏やかに暮らせることを心から祈っています。
日本に来てくれてありがとう！️

I was watching you as a 4th grader in 2016, I'm 16 now and the amount of joy I get from seeing you just live is crazy. It sucks being sick (I'm currently taking care of both of my parents who have covid) but I'm glad it got better. I really hope Bjorn gets to enjoy the holidays more and more in Japan as he gets older. Keep being a great dad and thank you so much.

seeing your baby get sick for the first time is really hard because you are trying everything to make them feel better and safe but they can’t communicate how they feel so you can’t tell how they are feeling it sucks so much:(
Björn is a mini Felix. I’ve been watching pewdiepie for over 10 years. Seeing him being a family man is so heartwarming to see. Marzia is absolutely glowing, shes beautiful.
My man couldn't resist the insurmountable fatherhood drive of acquiring a family mini van.
Watching this makes me feel so happy. Grew up with you and now your just a wholesome dad. So awesome. Love this new content.

Whispered “so cute” at the same time as pewds.
YOU GUYS ARE DOING GREAT AS PARENTS. 
He’s so adorable and sweet. Reminds me of my first born and makes me excited for my second born.
Loving these videos
9:06 Bjorn just goofin with his dad like this is just so fricken cute man
Marzia's genes didn't stand a chance. Little Bjorn is literally mini pewds

I love those videos! You seem so authentic in those mwa at the end of the video, because this is what your life looks like, you are a dad who shows how to send kisses and even if it is a little crazy, it is like so real I like it!

Felix with those jeans is getting the dad vibes. 
God bless man, take care!
I love how Bjorn looks so much like Felix. It’s insane.
Watching Björn mesmerized by the leaf gives me hope for humanity.

It is amazing. I used to watch Pewds when he did play-throughs of Amnesia and now he is a dad with responsibilities. I watched him when I was in college and nothing to worry about and now like him I am a father with children and I STILL watch his vids. It is wonderful.
I love seeing the bits of Marzia and hearing her voice through these vlogs. Everyone looks so happy
I absolutely love the editing of the vlogs style and cinematography, it reminds me of a Wes Anderson film in the best way

7:00 - Bjorn doing what comes naturally to all Swedes: making dance music.

PS - My oldest daughter got RSV when she was 5 months old and it was a worrying time but we got through it. The first time she got sick was the worst.
Congrats on the baby and good luck with everything
Pewds being a good dad as always Such wholesome content
This makes me want to be a father. Pewds embodies everything I think fatherhood should be about. Amazing work dad, proud of you!
9:31 maybe it's too early to tell, but looking at Bjorn seeing himself and making cute faces at the camera really gives me the feel that he was born with natural charisma for the camera!

Wonderful seeing the countdown to the lighting of your Christmas  Tree! Your videos always bring such quiet beauty and take us on your journey with you, which brings great joy. Marzia is amazing! Bjorn is sooooo adorable and already a toddler! Merry Christmas!

Hey Felix. I know that this is kinda odd. But my brother took his life this year, and you remind me a lot of him. It brings me so much comfort and peace watching you live such a calm and fulfilling life. It feels like I get to see pieces of him live on. Thank you for making this content, it’s great coping for me.

Was that Björn saying “hey, Dad” at 20:22 so adorable! I love these clogs and the adventures you guys go on (also your news letter is lovely) I’m disabled and can’t work or get out much but these vlogs feel like you guys are showing me around Japan, really good serotonin boost. I’ve been subbed since King of the Web days and would have never imagined this timeline but I’m glad to be apart of it
1:10 THAT JUST MELTED MY HEART
ご家族で自然やハイキングを楽しまれている様子にほっこりさせていただきました。癒されました
Bjorn has gotta be one of the cutest babies bro happy for you and marzia thanks for being there for me while i grew up as well

For 14 years I've been watching your content, To say how wholesome these videos have become since then shows the growth you have made from a Youtube gamer who made laugh, to that awkward Youtube years of strife, to a dope as dad and husband. Keep growing bro. Dispite the video being ill, and the little one hurting too sucks. It sucks to be a parent taking care of your kids and seeing them hurt, but you two did great.
Seeing you, Marzia and bjorn smiling makes me feel so happy, hope you have an amazing holiday season.
every time i go over the bridge in Erangel i think of you so glad to see how far you you have come
I watched PewDiePie as a child - even a teen, seeing him with his son is so wholesome but so so surreal too.
9:32 bjorn will make a great Youtuber he already knows how to make a face for the thumbnail
11:20 They knew Bjorn was coming. Beware of his cuteness.
seeing felix take care of his kid that well honestly makes me cry. i didnt grow up with a dad like him. he'll grow up to be a nice kid.

I know the premise of this video was a bit more sad, but this was genuinely the happiest a YouTube-Video has made me feel in a long time. I am so happy for you and your family and hope that first sickness just kinda hit Bjorn out of nowhere, much love from Sweden!
15:30 Hey pewds! You can get a long leash for Momo if you plan on going to an open space, that way she can run around while on a really long leash :) thats what my family does
It’s so amazing that from 6 years ago it’s so crazy to think they’re the same person love you man
Family Friendly Felix has come full circle ️
its crazy how much bjorn looks like felix

I cant watching these vlogs without grinning from ear to ear. Im just so happy for u guys. I wish u all the best and a happy life. I hope everyone here can get a happy familiy like this in their life.
Watching a vlog of a Pewd's with his family is kind of elevated by how much I've seen he and Marzia over the years, it's always a beautiful experience, thank you for uploading. Merry Crimmus!
PewDiePie now is like when you finish watching a really good anime and you wish you could see what happens after. Now it's just him documenting life. Which is so cool
You are an inspiration to us all Pewds. Wishing you the best
the aura i get from your family and your lil home is butterscotch colored. just warm and sweet and tender. if my life aint got vibes like this someday, i dont want it
Super heart-warming,  Hope you enjoy your holidays & wishing you, Marzia & your son nothing but the best
This video makes me Happy
Wasn't gonna let myself get interested in this Felix's family life, but godamnit.... HOW frickin ADORABLE is that precious little Bear
Pewds, I know lots of people tell you this all the time, so here goes one more  -  We are all incredibly proud of you bro.
It’s been a while since I watched Pewdiepie. But seeing him being a family man with YouTube on the side is pretty much bitter sweet since Felix grew up. He’s an example what YouTubers should be
Felix really took success to a different level. You guys look happy af, congrats on life in general :)
2:48 that's def martzias smile there

It shouldn’t be a big deal, it should be a totally normal thing but at the beginning when Felix was saying Marzia didn’t feel good so he was quickly heading back home to check on her, I thought that was just amazing. I’ve had a lot of health problems in my life including massive migraines that ended up being something that required brain surgery, so many kidney stones and many that required surgery as well, digestive problems and so on. Whenever I was in pain or felt really sick, my ex husband could not have cared less. He never took me to the hospital when I needed to go. He made my mom take me and furthermore he wouldn’t even watch our children while I was in the ER. He had me take them with me. I remember once lying on the floor crying in severe pain due to one of the migraines and he just laid in bed and turned the tv up very loudly so he wouldn’t have to hear me. I could go on but basically I’m saying I’m so amazed anytime a man does something kind/compassionate/helpful etc for his significant other or child.
My son also got a really bad flu in November, and it's the worst thing I've seen him go through. It just makes your heart so sad to see them that way
The scene with the leaves falling and Bjorn gives some insane nostalgia vibes. Those are like those scenes that end up being faint memories.
Pewds is the real one the OG Content Creator whos still goin strong, man the rest of some other CCs I have know either fell off or got cancled recently like wtf.
